snippet: The world has made great progress against malaria, but the fight is stalling for lack of funds, the World Health Organization’s annual report on malaria concluded on Monday.
abstract: World Health Organization's annual report on malaria concludes that fight against disease is stalling for lack of funds, despite great progress that has been made in last decade.
lead_paragraph: The world has made great progress against malaria, but the fight is stalling for lack of funds, the World Health Organization’s annual report on malaria concluded on Monday.

headline.seo: Lack of Funds Could Weaken Malaria Fight, Report Says
headline.main: Fears That Lack of Money Will Weaken Malaria Battle
headline.print_headline: Fears That Lack of Money Will Weaken Malaria Battle
